mapper.select: insert into member (mb_id, mb_pwd, mb_nm, mb_gen, mb_birth, mb_tel, mb_email) values (#{mb_id}, #{mb_pwd}, #{mb_nm}, #{mb_gen} , concat(#{mb_birth1},'년',#{mb_birth2},'월',#{mb_birth3},'일') , concat(#{mb_tel1},'-',#{mb_tel2},'-',#{mb_tel3}) , concat(#{mb_email1},'@',#{mb_email2}))
select count(mb_id) cnt from member where mb_id = #{mb_login_id} and mb_pwd = #{mb_login_pwd}
select count(mb_id) cnt from member where mb_id = #{mb_login_id}
